Being too thin can be deadlier than being overweight, Danish study reveals

16 Sep 2025 ‚Ä¢ 1 min read

Nutriish Summary:
New research from Denmark challenges long-held assumptions about body weight and health, revealing that being overweight‚Äîor even moderately obese‚Äîdoes not necessarily increase the risk of death compared to those at the upper end of the "normal" BMI range. In fact, those who are underweight or at the lower end of the so-called healthy spectrum faced higher risks.
